warning_message: Hi! Use the test card number : 4242 4242 4242 4242 ‚ö† WARNING ‚ö†: DON'T add any real payment info The bot will store User data And shipping data. NOTE: THE BOT HAS'T ACCESS TO ANY BANK DATA.
start_message: Welcome üòÑ This bot is created to test Telegram payments. To test unreal payment, use the command: /invoice Use /help to more info about the bot.
project_message: This project was created by @Muaath_5 üòè Project Source Code On GitHub
inline_message: You can use send invoices via this bot in inline query üòç! Just use the button below
help_message:
Use /start to get a little info about the bot.
Use /invoice to get a Test invoice, Don't worry, it's a test.
Use /inline to get info about inline queries.
Use /project to get the project source and can help in the project.
Use /help to get this menu again ‚ò∫.
successful_payment_message:
Thank you for testing! üòå
